Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pike[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Entropy Revolver[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageEntropy/] Entropy damage.
完成基础训练后收到的标准制式装备。[br/][br/]其中包含：[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]电压长矛[/AbilityGreen]（可在近距离造成多次 [DamageWave/] 电弧伤害）以及[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]电压手枪[/AbilityGreen]（可造成多次 [DamageWave/] 电弧伤害）。
Volt Pike and Volt Pistol are Oathbound weapons

The pack you received after Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This advanced training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/].[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/][AbilityGreen]Volt Pike[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Static Bomb[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [DamageWave/] Arc Damage in a 1 hex radius.

完成近战训练后收到的装备。[br/][br/]通过此次进阶训练，你获得如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]近战专家 I[/AbilityGreen]（使用近战武器时可提升伤害）。[br/][AbilityGreen]活力 I[/AbilityGreen](提升最大 [hp/]）。[br/][br/]装备包含：[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]电压长矛[/AbilityGreen]（可在近距离造成多次 [DamageWave/] 电弧伤害）以及一枚[br/][AbilityGreen]静电炸弹[/AbilityGreen]（可对 1 单元格范围造成 [DamageWave/] 电弧伤害）。

Text between {} should NOT be localized as they are numerical values in-game. Text between [] should NOT be localized as they are either icons or text formatting
EXAMPLE: "Hero gains {PersonaAccDmg} increased damage and accuracy " looks in-game like "Hero gains +5 increased damage and accuracy"

The [AbilityGreen]Protector[/AbilityGreen] is a melee-focused battlesuit vehicle made specifically to protect its allies.[br/][br/]You have the following skill:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Protector[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful melee [Damagewavel/] Arc capabilities.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pistol[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [Damagewave/] Arc damage to a single target.

[AbilityGreen]保卫者[/AbilityGreen]是一种近战专精的机甲载具，专为保护盟友而设计。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]保卫者[/AbilityGreen]（配备强力近战 [Damagewavel/] 电弧武器和[AbilityGreen]模块[/AbilityGreen]）[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]电压手枪[/AbilityGreen]，可对单个目标造成 [Damagewave/] 电弧伤害。
Protector is an Oatbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Warden[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle dedicated to medium-ranged attacks and support.[br/][br/]You have the following skill:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Warden[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful ranged [Damagewavel/] Arc capabilities.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Static Bomb[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [DamageWave/] Arc Damage in a 1 hex radius.

[AbilityGreen]典狱官[/AbilityGreen]是一种中程攻击与支援机甲载具。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]典狱官[/AbilityGreen]（配备强力远程 [Damagewavel/] 电弧武器和[AbilityGreen]模块[/AbilityGreen]）[br/]一枚[AbilityGreen]静电炸弹[/AbilityGreen]，可对 1 个单元格范围造成 [DamageWave/] 电弧伤害。
Warden is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Warlord[/AbilityGreen] is a mobile, melee-focused battlesuit vehicle given to you for your display of skill in combat.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Warlord[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamageWave/] Arc and movement capabilities.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pistol[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [Damagewave/] Arc damage to a single target.

[AbilityGreen]军阀[/AbilityGreen]是一种机动的近战专精机甲载具，因杰出的战斗技巧而授予。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][AbilityGreen]近战专家 I[/AbilityGreen]（使用近战武器时可提升伤害）。[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]军阀[/AbilityGreen]（配备强力 [DamageWave/] 电弧与机动能力和[AbilityGreen]模块[/AbilityGreen]）[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]电压手枪[/AbilityGreen]，可对单个目标造成 [Damagewave/] 电弧伤害。
Warlord is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Marquis[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle specialized in backline support.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] hit points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Marquis[/AbilityGreen] with various support abilities.[br/]The [AbilityGreen]Watcher's Scrolls[/AbilityGreen], granting [abilityblue]Gift of Providence.[/abilityblue]

[AbilityGreen]侯爵[/AbilityGreen]是一种专门用于后方支援的机甲载具。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][AbilityGreen]活力 I[/AbilityGreen]（提升最大 [hp/] 生命值）[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]侯爵[/AbilityGreen]（具有多样化支援技能）。[br/][AbilityGreen]守望者卷轴[/AbilityGreen]，能够给予[abilityblue]天佑之礼。[/abilityblue]
Marquis is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Light Bringer[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle based on a Paladin Warden. It has Celestian ranged attacks.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] hit points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Light Bringer[/AbilityGreen] with a ranged attack and a banner spreading [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Entropic Revolver[/AbilityGreen], a pistol dealing [damageentropy/] damage.

[AbilityGreen]光明使者[/AbilityGreen]是由帕拉丁典狱官改进而来的机甲载具，可使用星神远程攻击。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][AbilityGreen]活力 I[/AbilityGreen]（提升最大 [hp/] 生命值）[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]光明使者[/AbilityGreen]（使用远程攻击，且带有可施加[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]和[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]效果的旗帜）。[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]混沌左轮手枪[/AbilityGreen]，可造成 [damageentropy/] 伤害。
Light Bringer is an Oathbound Celestian vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Purifier[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle based on the Warlord. It has Thermal attacks.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarters Specialization I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your melee damage.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Purifier[/AbilityGreen] vehicle with a multi-target melee attack and an artillery attack.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Entropic Revolver[/AbilityGreen], a pistol dealing [damageentropy/] damage.

[AbilityGreen]净化者[/AbilityGreen]是由军阀改进而来的机甲载具，使用热能攻击。[br/][br/]你拥有如下技能：[br/][AbilityGreen]领航[/AbilityGreen]（让指挥官骑乘基础载具和坐骑）。[br/][AbilityGreen]近战专家 I[/AbilityGreen]（使用近战武器时可提升伤害）。[br/][br/]装备包括：[br/][AbilityGreen]净化者[/AbilityGreen]（可对多个目标进行近战攻击与火炮攻击。[br/]一把[AbilityGreen]混沌左轮手枪[/AbilityGreen]，可造成 [damageentropy/] 伤害。
Purifier is an Oathbound Promethean vehicle unit

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
